title: Correction: Unmasking Activation of the Zygotic Genome Using Chromosomal Deletions in the Drosophila Embryo
fullText:
In PLoS Biology, volume 5, issue 5: doi:10.1371/journal.pbio.0050117

An incorrect version of Table S3 was published. The correct Table S3 is given here; the legend remains the same.
